title: Protein Intake Calculator | Health & Fitness Nutrition Tool

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Unit conversion: \( \text{kg} = \frac{\text{lb}}{2.20462} \) Lean body mass (optional): \( \text{LBM}_{kg} = \text{Weight}_{kg} \times (1 - \frac{\text{BodyFat}\%}{100}) \) General health: \( \text{Protein} = \text{BW}_{kg} \times r, \quad r \in [0.8,\,1.2] \) Endurance: \( \text{Protein} = \text{BW}_{kg} \times r, \quad r \in [1.2,\,1.7] \) Strength/Muscle gain: \( \text{Protein} = \text{BW}_{kg} \times r, \quad r \in [1.6,\,2.2] \) Fat loss (if LBM known): \( \text{Protein} = \text{LBM}_{kg} \times r, \quad r \in [2.3,\,3.1] \) Fat loss (if LBM unknown): \( \text{Protein} = \text{BW}_{kg} \times r, \quad r \in [1.8,\,2.4] \) Pregnancy: \( \text{Protein} = 1.1 \times \text{BW}_{kg} \) Lactation: \( \text{Protein} = 1.3 \times \text{BW}_{kg} \) For athletic goals, the tool can add a small increment (up to +0.2 g/kg) based on weekly training frequency.
